name: Mover Advance (mcolverdesigns)
description: 2/19/17 Update: Take on the adventure, and save your friends from the evil Sparks. Mover must move through a labyrinth filled with slugs, bats, robots, spikes, fireballs, eyeball monsters, and attacking fish to reach Sparks.Mover must move through a labyrinth filled with slugs, bats, robots, spikes, fireballs, eyeball monsters, and attacking fish to reach Sparks. Save your friends from him, before he eats them alive. This is a remake game from the original HTML 5 game. Click on the Amazon link below, to download game to your Android device.
